About Me

I am 29 years old, currently living in Skopje and graduated from SEMOS JavaScript Academy. As you can see, I have worked in a construction company, but that didn't fulfill me and I started taking YouTube and Udemy courses for programming and started to really like it and then I enrolled in the SEMOS JavaScript Academy. I have no prior experience working in IT companies but I am always eager to work and learn in new environments since I have extensive interests in the field of Informatics and Science in general.
